page.title: 10CHRISTCHURCH PRIORY SCHOOL
page.content: OUR SCHOOL STARTS AT 9AM AND FINISHES AT 3.15PM. IN THE MORNING WE GO INTO ASSEMBLY IN THE HALL AT 9.10. OUR SCHOOL LESSONS ARE MATHS, ART, ENGLISH,R.E., STUDIES, SCIENCE ETC. LESSONS USUALLY TAKE ABOUT HALF AN HOUR TO AN HOUR. WE SIT ON UNCOMFORTABLE WOODEN CHAIRS AND OUR DESKS ARE WOODEN TOO WITH FLAP-UP LIDS. OUR DESKS ALSO HAVE INK HOLES BUT WE DON'T USE THEM AT ALL. WE ALSO HAVE COMPUTERS AND PRINTERS. OUR SCHOOL HAS SEVEN CLASSES AND CLASS ONE IS THE TOP CLASS. WE HAVE A BIG PLAYGROUND AND SWIMMING POOL. GIRLS USUALLY PLAY NETBALL IN THE PLAYGROUND BUT BOYS PLAY FOOTBALL.
